resources.string: This app was made by Moshe Kav, as part of school project for the Bagrut.

Enter your function in the field that says "function", then it will automatedly draw to the board.
 You can use your fingers to touch the screen and move the function for more inspection.
 If you want to calculate integral, just enter the start and end positions in the fields "start" and "end", and the result will show automatically on the right.
 On the menu top left corner, you have 4 options:
 1. Saves, you can add functions and store them in memory, and get them later.
 2. Music, by clicking it the music will start play in loops.
 3. Qr Code Scanner, by allowing the app to use the camera, you can scan QR codes of function.
 4. About, contain info about me.
 5. Instruction, this page, that explain how to use the app.
